pages.name: Ritual of the Shepherd
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
Increases the maturity rate of baby animals within its range.$(br2)$(water)Water Runes: 4$(br)$(air)Air Runes: 4$(br)$(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 4$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 16

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total amount of $(raw)Raw Will$() in the Aura.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Decreases the time it takes for adults to breed again.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Causes adults that have not bred lately to run at mobs and explode.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Automatically breeds adults within its area using items in the connected chest.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Growth) Animals within this range will grow much faster. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 7 $(li)Vertical Radius: 7

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Chest) Chest for breeding items (if properly augmented, requires $(steadfast)Steadfast Will$()).$(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 1 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 3 $(li)Vertical Radius: 3
